name: Event Trigger
description: Subscribes to an external event (e.g., YouTrack 'attachment added'), emits the normalized event payload on output.event.

event.description: Normalized event payload from the source.

name: JavaScript Transform
description: Runs small, sandboxed JS to transform inputs. Returns whatever the function returns as output.

code.description: A JS snippet. Receives {inputs, args, ctx}. Must return a JSON-serializable value.

args.description: Arbitrary JSON passed to the script as 'args'.

output.description: The value returned by the JS snippet.

name: External Action
description: Executes an external operation from an Actions Catalog (YouTrack, MCP, or App-to-App). Uses the catalog to validate inputs and shape outputs.

name: LLM Extract (Structured)
description: Performs LLM-based information extraction. Optionally auto-converts PDFs to text. Returns the modelâ€™s parsed JSON under result and helpful diagnostics under meta.

outputJsonSchema.description: JSON Schema describing the desired result object.

mimeType.description: MIME of the content if provided inline.

text.description: Plain text to extract from (alternative to file).

rawText.description: Source text actually used by the extractor.

meta.description: Diagnostics (token counts, model, temperature, cost, validation errors).

name: Template Render
description: Renders a text template using args (Mustache-style or your chosen engine). Emits the rendered string as output.

args.description: Arbitrary JSON context available to the template.
